name: Socket Slinger
description:
The people in Electro-city were ec-static. The industry was booming with new electronics everyday. After a while though, the outlets started to get tired of supplying energy for the humans. They begged for help, but the humans didn’t listen. So, the outlets got angry. Every time a human plugged in an electronic device, their energy ran through the cord and took over their body. Soon, the entire city was infested with evil outlets. The outlets realized that they should also take over the other cities. Then they’d be unstoppable! But, there’s one thing that stands between them and the world. Your team.

Together, you and your team must shoot plugs into the outlet-infested people to electrocute them!  Reconnect them to what they were meant to be!

You’re the last hope!

Create a world on one device(Preferably a computer with a large screen), and then join that world on separate android devices or computers. Type in the world code to enter the world. Start the game. Then, start slinging plugs! You can change the vertical trajectory of the plug by changing the vertical angle of the phone.
